name: Not a Shot in Hell
description:
A game developed by long time friends for Mix and Jam 2020.
FPS x Basketball ( x Stealth?)

The most realistic dribbling controls in a video game

Avoid the fiendish sportsmen, shoot a hoop, & ball with your bros.

Stevie - @steven22steven
Zach - @zach_cherry_
Kody - @PurpleLizardMan [Character Art]
